pages.text: I can crush and pulverize several materials with a pestle in a mortar, including separating the magical essence of things. Different mortar materials seem to affect what the output may be, so I need to look out for that.

The simplest way of accessing the natural magic present in the world is probably grinding down the elements into their most primitive form so that I can access the primordial essence that lies within, pure $(thing)vis.
